text: "Skating Away on the Thin Ice of the New Day" is a 1975 song by British progressive rock band Jethro Tull and was taken from their seventh studio album War Child. It did not chart at all due to its limited success of the single. ==References== Category:1975 songs Category:Progressive rock songs Category:Folk rock songs Category:Jethro Tull (band) songs
title: Skating Away on the Thin Ice of the New Day
